page_content: The page reports on a fatal motorcycle accident in Bern and the subsequent police investigation.
The page discusses tax-deductible expenses that are not included in business expenses.
The page explains how tax-deductible losses from self-employment can be calculated and carried forward.
The page informs about traffic restrictions in Bern due to the 29th Swiss Women's Run.
The page advises visitors to use public transportation for an upcoming football match between FC Köniz and FC Zürich due to limited parking.
The page outlines the procedural steps involved in cases before the Administrative Court and other commissions.
The page provides guidelines for filling out tax forms regarding marital status and registered partnerships.
